result.ga: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.orig: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.html: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachtaI enjoyed your company.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain mé sult as ḃur gcuideaċtaI enjoyed your company.

result.eng: The company was at the vanguard in the computer industry.
result.ga: Bhí an comhlacht ar thús cadhnaíochta in earnáil na ríomhaireachta
result.orig: Bhí an comhlacht ar thús cadhnaíochta in earnáil na ríomhaireachta
result.html: Bhí an comhlacht ar thús cadhnaíochta in earnáil na ríomhaireachtaThe company was at the vanguard in the computer industry.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an coṁlaċt ar ṫús caḋnaíoċta in earnáil na ríoṁaireaċtaThe company was at the vanguard in the computer industry.

result.eng: I was employed by an American company for five years.
result.ga: Bhí mé fostaithe ag comhlacht Meiriceánach ar feadh cúig bliana
result.orig: Bhí mé fostaithe ag comhlacht Meiriceánach ar feadh cúig bliana
result.html: Bhí mé fostaithe ag comhlacht Meiriceánach ar feadh cúig blianaI was employed by an American company for five years.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé fostaiṫe ag coṁlaċt Meiriceánaċ ar feaḋ cúig blianaI was employed by an American company for five years.

result.eng: I spent a while in their company.
result.html: Chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadarI spent a while in their company.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé tamall ina gcoṁluadarI spent a while in their company.

result.eng: He created a modern image for the company.
result.ga: Chruthaigh sé íomhá nua-aimseartha don chomhlacht
result.orig: Chruthaigh sé íomhá nua-aimseartha don chomhlacht
result.html: Chruthaigh sé íomhá nua-aimseartha don chomhlachtHe created a modern image for the company.
result.ponchtml: Ċruṫaiġ sé íoṁá nua-aimsearṫa don ċoṁlaċtHe created a modern image for the company.

result.eng: How do you behave in the queen's company?
result.ga: Conas a iompraíonn tú tú féin i gcomhluadar na banríona
result.orig: Conas a iompraíonn tú tú féin i gcomhluadar na banríona
result.html: Conas a iompraíonn tú tú féin i gcomhluadar na banríonaHow do you behave in the queen's company?
result.ponchtml: Conas a iompraíonn tú tú féin i gcoṁluadar na banríonaHow do you behave in the queen's company?

result.eng: The company promotes certain products on the Irish market.
result.ga: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireann
result.orig: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireann
result.html: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireannThe company promotes certain products on the Irish market.
result.ponchtml: Déanann an coṁlaċt táirgí áiriṫe a ċur ċun cinn ar ṁargaḋ na hÉireannThe company promotes certain products on the Irish market.

result.html: Díolann an comhlacht ábhar tógálaThe company sells building materials.
result.ponchtml: Díolann an coṁlaċt áḃar tógálaThe company sells building materials.

result.html: Fostaí an chomhlachtaAn employee of the company.
result.ponchtml: Fostaí an ċoṁlaċtaAn employee of the company.

result.eng: Thank you for your company tonight.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.orig: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.html: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anochtThank you for your company tonight.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agaiḃ as ḃur gcoṁluadar anoċtThank you for your company tonight.

result.html: I gcuideachta cairdeIn the company of friends.
result.ponchtml: I gcuideaċta cairdeIn the company of friends.

result.eng: As it happens, I work in the same company.
result.ga: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céanna
result.orig: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céanna
result.html: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céannaAs it happens, I work in the same company.
result.ponchtml: Mar a ṫarlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa ċoṁlaċt céannaAs it happens, I work in the same company.

result.eng: He's working for an American company.
result.ga: Tá sé ag obair le comhlacht Meiriceánach
result.orig: Tá sé ag obair le comhlacht Meiriceánach
result.html: Tá sé ag obair le comhlacht MeiriceánachHe's working for an American company.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag obair le coṁlaċt MeiriceánaċHe's working for an American company.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
